pullRequest.title: Improve split generation for symlinked tables
pullRequest.bodyText:
Previously text or avro input format was assumed as
symlink target format. This prevented generation of
multiple splits per file. This change makes split
enumeration to use actual symlink target format.
Follow up of: #6158

commit.message:
Improve split generation for symlinked tables

Previously text or avro input format was assumed as
symlink target format. This prevented generation of
multiple splits per file. This change makes split
enumeration to use actual symlink target format.
